time also Linux is very portable we know a lot about the driver model in Linux so

inside of Android um or a mobile device so basically the team kind of looked at

battery powered U and that basically means going with a registry based uh

build those uh U plug in those those um codex and support for those that media

example that is often uh being uh you know asked about by the Enterprise customers is the

now it's not possible really to put in for Cisco proprietary VPN into an
otherwise open source project so for that reason um Android team has essentially left a slot open in this

to um to add a support for that so what that means is that um the vanilla
Android open source project does not have support for any Enterprise grade VPN however if a specific OEM such as
